title.rendered: 3-minute video:  Tom Lehrer’s funny song about nuclear holocaust

content.rendered:
In the early 1960s a university professor of mathematics wrote funny songs about topical issues.

At the link below you can watch/hear him perform one about nuclear weapons killing all of us.

It’s titled, “We Will All Go Together When We Go.”

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=frAEmhqdLFs
